oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Albumen print of Union soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While a war-time image, this albumen print was made after the Civil War. It features a Union soldier, probably cavalry, wearing a mounted service jacket & what appears to be an 1863 sword belt. He is holding a Remington pistol. According to the family, this image may be a member of the Spangler family from Knox County.
